Greenspan Projects.body:
I'm currently undertaking my juniorship with Greenspan Projects Ltd. So far I have been responsible for development, helping bring Puttify v2 to release. This included introducing a logging system, UI developments such as a leaderboard and helping with on-site deployments. Alongside providing support

I am also responsible for the development of DigiScoring, a plug & play system for any Mini-Golf course that can be customised for venues branding.

Winchester University.body: While at winchester University I managed to achieve a 1:1. I took many modules pertaining to Operating Systems and Cyber Security. Alongside developing three full stack applications using Java, JavaScript and Python. For my dissertation I attempted to create a Game Engine, BangJs, which leveraged PixiJs, Box2D and GSAP

Lecturing.body: Being a Computing Lecturer with SHCG allowed me to Develop critical skills in taking responsibility for a cohort of learners, through developing their curriculum and acting as a project manager for their larger projects. As part of my role as a lecturer I managed to ensure a whole class of 15+ learners achieved distinctions for their FMP that leveraged ExpressJs and EJS to create a full-stack application.

Skills.body: OSX(6 Years); Windows(7 years); Debian/Arch(6 Years); FileZilla(5 Years); PuTTY(5 Years); VSCode(7 Years); JavaScript(6 Years); PixiJS(6 Years); HTML(6 Years); CSS(6 Years); TypeScript(3 Years); OOP(4 years); Node/ExpressJs(3 Years); Python(7 Years); MySQL(1 Year); MongoDB(3 Years); GSAP(2 Years);
